question: A friend of yours is thinking about applying for the same course that you did at university. He/she has asked for your advice about studying this subject.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,give details of the course you took at the universityexplain why you recommend the universitygive some advice about how to apply
text: I’ve been doing well. I was really excited to hear about your interest in taking up the History course that I did at JNT University and am glad that you reached out to me for advice.

I’ve been thinking about giving you some details on this course. It lasts for about 2 years in which the first year includes two semesters and the second one has a major project to be completed by the end of the course.

As I’m aware of your high expectations from this learning, I believe that this can be the best university for you. Lectures are given by highly trained professionals. Also,  opportunities are provided to explore various historical monuments as a part of our research for the project.

I’ve done some research while sending my application and realized that the fastest way would be to apply through their website. The process is quite simple. If you log on to their home page, you will find an option at the top right corner. Click on “Apply” and fill in the details. The college will respond to your application within 2 days.
